response.overview: "Braaap Films #16 takes you “Over the Edge”, literally!  This year’s film gives you the sledding action you have been waiting for!  Deep powder, big breathtaking jumps, drops and “over the edge” action provide our viewers with a great look at the 2016 backcountry season.  See new up and coming talented riders like Nathan Greziuk, Jake Allen and more pull off some amazing and entertaining skills on a sled and some insane cliff drops. This year’s release from Braaap Films won’t let you down!  Braaap 16 “Over the Edge” includes Morgan Gamache, Jake Allen, Brock Hoyer,  Reagan Sieg, Alex Berg, Jon Jean, Chad Greziuk, Nathan Greziuk, Denver Debes  Oli Arnold, Travis Squair, Shena Thomas, Logan Thibodeau, Andrew Munster, Cody Mcnolty, Luke Kennedy, Tucker Merz, Ryan Briscoe, Chad Edwards, Jordan Lepp, John Benjamin, Duncan Lee, Maria Sandberg, Bret Rasmussen and more!"
response.tagline: This year’s film gives you the sledding action you have been waiting for! Deep powder, big breathtaking jumps, drops and “over the edge” action provide our viewers with a great look at the 2016 backcountry season.
response.title: Braaap 16: Over the Edge
